Package db

package db
  • Class
    Description
    Duggbase
    Database connection class.
    Employee
    Represents an employee with relevant details such as ID, name, username, and employment status.
    EmployeeEditSession
    Manages the current session for editing employee details, implementing the Singleton pattern to ensure a single instance exists.
    Forecast
     
    Inventory
    A record representing an inventory item with various attributes such as cost, amount on hand, and description.
    item
    Represents an item with an ID, type, associated menu items, and supply list.
    Item_t
    Represents an item with an ID, name, and price.
    Menu_Items
    Class representing a menu item in the POS system.
    MenuEditSession
    Singleton class that manages the current menu item being edited in a session.
    Order
    The Order class represents an order in the system.
    OrderSession
    Manages the current session for an order, implementing the Singleton pattern to ensure a single instance exists for managing order details.
    Session
    Manages the current session for an employee, implementing the Singleton pattern to ensure a single instance exists for managing user sessions.
